name: Pepper Global
tag_list: social, ecommerce, social-commerce, product-recommender, cashback, coupon, incentive, shopping, consumer
overview:
Pepper Global is a London based company that runs the social commerce community Shopadero.com

Shopadero.com is built on the premise that social commerce efforts by individual retailers and review websites do not truly put the consumer at the centre, and the social commerce model needs to be re-imagined to truly wrap products, reviews and incentives around consumers and their social world.

Shopadero.com serves 12 countries, works through Facebook Connect, and offers social intelligence based product recommendations, price comparison, visual product search, and incentives such as cashback and coupons.
